title: sattiyam vellum
sahitya:
sattiyam vellum dharumam tazhaittiDum dhairiyamAi iruppOm


anupallavi

  shuddha sutantara jyOti parAshakti toNDaraik-kAttiDuvAL


caraNam    uLLattil gItaiyum vaLLuvar vEdamum Unrip-paNi purivOm
kaLLaip-paghaivar kanalai aNaikkak-karuNai kaDaluDaiyOm
koLLai aDittuk-kozhutta bakAsurar koTTattai veTTenavaE
piLLai viLaiyATTAik-kiLLi eriyap-peria balam taruvAL
eTTu dishaiyum adhira jaya bhEri koTTi ezhundiDuvOm 
veTTumin pOla nam vIrattinukk-avaL vEgam aLittiDuvAL
